p: Guaiacol peroxidase (GPX) activity was studied according to the Upadhyaya et al. [ 22] method. The reaction combination included phosphate buffer (2.5 mL, 50 mM, pH = 7), H 2O 2 (1 mL, 1%), guaiacol (1 mL, 1%), and enzyme extracts (20 µL). The absorbance of the reaction mixtures was recorded at 470 nm via spectrophotometer (Biochrom WPA Biowave II UV/Visible), and the increment in absorbance at 470 nm was followed for 1 min. The activity was stated as mmole activity mg −1 protein.
